name: Floating grass/rock platform, left then right
desc: A platform that moves 5.5 tiles to the left, and then back.

name: Floating grass/rock platform, right then left
desc: A platform that moves 5.5 tiles to the right, and then back.

name: Floating grass/rock platform, up then down
desc: A platform that moves 5.5 tiles up, and then back down.

name: Floating grass/rock platform, down then up
desc: A platform that moves 5.5 tiles down, and then back up.

name: Grass/Rock platform, sinks
desc: A platform that's intended to be placed on Lava. It sinks when Mario steps on it, then vanishes. It doesn't actually require sprite buoyancy to function, however.

name: Turn Block Bridge, Horiz/Vert (contracted)
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts horizontally, then vertically. It spawns fully contracted. This variant is equivalient to vanilla's sprite 59.

name: ..fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts horizontally, and then vertically. It spawns fully contracted.

name: ...on/off controlled
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts horizontally, then vertically. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts fully contracted. Note that on spawn it will always transition contracted -> horiz -> contracted -> vertical on ON/OFF state change, regardless of its state when it despawned.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts horizontally, then vertically. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts fully contracted. Note that on spawn it will always transition contracted -> horiz -> contracted -> vertical on ON/OFF state change, regardless of its state when it despawned.

name: Turn Block Bridge, Horiz/Vert (expanded)
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts horizontally, then vertically. It spawns fully expanded horizontally.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts horizontally, then vertically. It spawns fully expanded horizontally.

name: ...on/off controlled
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts horizontally, then vertically. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts fully expanded horizontally. Note that on spawn it will always transition contracted -> horizontal -> contracted -> vertical (and so on) on ON/OFF state change, regardless of its state when it despawned.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts horizontally, then vertically. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts fully expanded horizontally. Note that on spawn it will always transition contracted -> horizontal -> contracted -> vertical (and so on) on ON/OFF state change, regardless of its state when it despawned.

name: Turn Block Bridge, Vert/Horiz (contracted)
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts vertically, then horizontally. It spawns fully contracted.

name: ..fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts vertically, and then horizontally. It spawns fully contracted.

name: ...on/off controlled
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts vertically, then horizontally. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts fully contracted. Note that on spawn it will always transition contracted -> vertical -> contracted -> horiz (and so on) on ON/OFF state change, regardless of its state when it despawned.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts horizontally, then vertically. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts fully contracted. Note that on spawn it will always transition contracted -> vertical -> contracted -> horiz (and so on) on ON/OFF state change, regardless of its state when it despawned.

name: Turn Block Bridge, Vert/Horiz (expanded)
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts horizontally, then vertically. It spawns fully expanded vertically.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts vertically, then horizontally. It spawns fully expanded vertically.

name: ...on/off controlled
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts vertically, then horizontally. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts fully expanded vertically. Note that on spawn it will always transition contracted -> vertical -> contracted -> horizontal (and so on) on ON/OFF state change, regardless of its state when it despawned.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts vertically, then horizontally. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts fully expanded vertically. Note that on spawn it will always transition contracted -> vertical -> contracted -> horizontal (and so on) on ON/OFF state change, regardless of its state when it despawned.

name: Turn Block Bridge, Horizontal (contracted)
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts horizontally. It spawns fully contracted. This variant is equivalent to vanilla's sprite 5A.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts horizontally. It spawns fully contracted.

name: ...on/off controlled
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts horizontally. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts contracted.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts horizontally. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts contracted.

name: ...blue POW controlled
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts horizontally. It only changes state when the blue POW timer changes from active to inactive (and vice versa). It spawns fully contracted.

name: Turn Block Bridge, Horizontal (expanded)
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts horizontally. It spawns fully expanded.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts horizontally. It spawns fully expanded.

name: ...on/off controlled
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts horizontally. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and spawns expanded.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts horizontally. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts expanded.

name: ...blue POW controlled
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts horizontally. It only changes state when the blue POW timer goes from active to inactive (and vice versa). It spawns expanded.

name: Turn Block Bridge, Vertical (contracted)
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts vertically. It spawns fully contracted.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts vertically. It spawns fully contracted.

name: ...on/off controlled
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts vertically. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts contracted.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts vertically. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts contracted.

name: ...blue POW controlled
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts vertically. It only changes state when the blue POW state transitions from active to inactive (and vice versa). It starts contracted.

name: Turn Block Bridge, Vertical (expanded)
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts vertically. It spawns fully expanded.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts vertically. It spawns fully expanded.

name: ...on/off controlled
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts vertically. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and spawns expanded.

name: ...fast
desc: A turn block bridge which rapidly expands and contracts vertically. It only changes state when the ON/OFF value changes, and starts expanded.

name: ...blue POW controlled
desc: A turn block bridge which expands and contracts horizontally. It only changes state when the blue POW timer transitions from active to inactive (and vice versa). It starts expanded.
